title: How Is 'Virgin River' No. 1 on Netflix?
description:
Juliet Litman is joined by Amelia Wedemeyer to try and understand why the Hallmark-esque show 'Virgin River' is at the top of Netflix's most-popular shows in the U.S.

Hosts: Juliet Litman and Amelia Wedemeyer
